contribute.title: Contribute a Package
contribute.step1.title: Create Package
contribute.step1.desc: Write your function blocks in IEC 61131-3 ST, create a manifest.json, and package as .ieclib (ZIP).
contribute.step2.title: Fork & PR
contribute.step2.desc: Fork iec2-registry, add your package to packages/, and submit a Pull Request.
contribute.step3.title: Auto Publish
contribute.step3.desc: CI validates your package. Once merged, it appears in the registry and VS Code extension automatically.
install.title: Install from VS Code
install.cmd: Ctrl+Shift+P → IEC: Manage Libraries → Online → Search & Install
